article_title: A Better Idea Than the Massive Government Spending Bill
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: Sen. Mike Lee says the omnibus spending bill is chock full of controversial policies that never would have passed had they been exposed to the light of day.
